name: This is Me
description:
This is me tells the story about who I am as a person, while telling you exactly what to do and where to go in the form of a 2D platformer.

This is by far not my best game. I just had a busy week so this is the best I could do in 24 hours. I probably spent too much time on graphics...

hope you enjoy and I hope the last part gets you excited about what else could come!
